short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets the Google Cloud Platform & Firebase Documentation language to English and overrides the language-detector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you to easily keep the language of the Google Cloud Platform Documentation, GCP Console and Firebase pages to be set to English and override the language-detector so it won't be switched back to any other auto detected or local language.
